description: Legendary Nikes are the most powerful Nike variants in each dimension. They have been corrupted by Nolem but can be freed by Collectors who defeat them in battle.

ogNike.name: OG Nike
ogNike.title: The First Pig
ogNike.description: The original Nike. Found terrified and alone, fleeing from Nolem. Formed the First Bond with OG Charles.
ogNike.burden: Feels every Nike across every dimension — their joys, fears, and deaths. Has been carrying 5,555 souls for eons.
ogNike.quote: Nike Prime isn't one soul carrying 5,555. Nike Prime is 5,555 souls carrying each other.
ogNike.appearance: Exhausted but determined. Larger than normal Nikes. Eyes that have seen too much.

legendaryNikes.name: Ninja Nike
legendaryNikes.title: The Shadow That Sees All Futures
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: The loneliness of seeing futures where everyone he loves dies
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Showing him futures where connection survives
legendaryNikes.quote: I've seen a thousand futures. In most of them, you fail. But in some... in some, you don't.

legendaryNikes.name: Viking Nike
legendaryNikes.title: The Frost-Blooded
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: The boredom of having no equal
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Showing him that true strength is protecting others
legendaryNikes.quote: I've killed everything worth killing. What's left?

legendaryNikes.name: Nike Tyson
legendaryNikes.title: The Undefeated
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Loneliness of greatness — no one to share victory with
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Showing him that victory means nothing alone
legendaryNikes.quote: I'M THE GREATEST! ...so why does it feel so empty?

legendaryNikes.name: Gladiator Nike
legendaryNikes.title: The Redeemed
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Teaching him that redemption isn't earned through blood
legendaryNikes.quote: The crowd demands blood. Maybe mine will finally be enough.

legendaryNikes.name: Cyberpunk Nike
legendaryNikes.title: The Disconnected
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Digital isolation — connected to everyone, close to no one
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Showing him the difference between connection and connectivity
legendaryNikes.quote: I'm connected to a billion nodes. So why do I feel so alone?

legendaryNikes.name: Dimension Eater
legendaryNikes.title: The Desperate
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Consuming dimensions to prevent Nolem from getting them
legendaryNikes.emotionalTheme: Becoming the monster to fight the monster
legendaryNikes.freedBy: Showing him that prevention isn't the same as protection
legendaryNikes.quote: If I eat it first, Nolem can't have it. That's... that's good, right?

champion.description: Warriors who excel in combat. Often become leaders.

scholar.description: Minds who solve problems and create solutions. Work behind scenes.

oddity.description: Unique abilities that seem useless but prove crucial. Often underestimated.

elemental.description: Adapted to extreme environments. Powers tied to their dimension.

nikePrime.name: Nike Prime
nikePrime.description: The concept of all 5,555 Nikes acting as one being
nikePrime.nature: Not a single entity but a unified consciousness
nikePrime.quote: Nike Prime isn't one soul carrying 5,555. Nike Prime is 5,555 souls carrying each other.

created.method: Physically created by combining DNA and knowledge from multiple Nikes

prophecied.role: Will restore the First Bond and defeat Nolem
